panels.description: Shows the overall health of the ceph cluster
panels.title: Health

targets.expr:
count(
  count(
    ceph_disk_occupation
  ) by (instance)) -
count(
  (count by(instance) (ceph_disk_occupation * 
    on(ceph_daemon) group_right(instance) ceph_osd_up == 0) - 
  count by(instance) (ceph_disk_occupation)) == 0)

count(
  (count by(instance) (ceph_disk_occupation * 
    on(ceph_daemon) group_right(instance) ceph_osd_up == 0) - 
  count by(instance) (ceph_disk_occupation)) == 0)

panels.description: Shows the growth rate based on osd usage over the past $growth_window.

targets.expr: topk(1, ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes offset 1d) - ignoring (instance,job) topk(1, ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes offset 7d)

panels.title: $growth_window Growth Rate

panels.description: Shows the estimated number of weeks left, based on consumption over the past $growth_window.

targets.expr:
(ceph_cluster_total_bytes - ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes) /
  scalar(topk(1, ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes offset 1d) - ignoring (instance,job) topk(1, ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes offset 7d))

panels.title: Weeks Remaining

panels.description: This panel indicate whether scrub/deep scrub is running within the cluster. NB. If either of these features are turned off, the cluster will enter a WARN state. Click on the panel or the link below to look at cluster information in more detail
panels.title: Scrub

panels.description: Shows the read/write threshold of client IOPS serviced by the ceph cluster
panels.title: Client Read/Write Ratio

panels.description: Shows the OSD apply and commit latency at the $percentile%ile across the cluster over the past 15 minutes
panels.title: OSD Apply vs Commit Latency

panels.description: CPU usage is presented based on the $percentile%ile across all OSD hosts
panels.title: OSD Hosts CPU Busy

panels.description: RAM Usage shows the $percentile%ile of RAM used across all OSD hosts
panels.title: RAM Util.

panels.description: Total IOPS from all OSDs in the cluster
panels.title: Disk IOPS

panels.description: The count of the number of disks in the cluster that are over $disk_full_threshold% full.
panels.title: Nearly Full Disks

panels.description: This panel shows the 5th %ile disk latency, indicating that 95% of the OSDs are delivering this latency or higher

targets.expr:
max(
  irate(node_disk_read_time_ms[30s]) / irate(node_disk_reads_completed[30s])
  +
  irate(node_disk_write_time_ms[30s]) / irate(node_disk_writes_completed[30s])
  + ignoring(ceph_daemon,job) ceph_disk_occupation
)

sum(
    (irate(node_disk_read_time_ms[1m]) + irate(node_disk_write_time_ms[1m]) / 
    (irate(node_disk_reads_completed[1m]) + irate(node_disk_writes_completed[1m])) 
    +
    ignoring(ceph_daemon,job) ceph_disk_occupation)) / count(ceph_osd_up)

panels.title: Disk Latency

panels.description: Chart shows the disk utilization over the past 15 mins expressed as an average across all OSDs, and at the $percentile%ile.
panels.title: Disk Utilization
